response.scenario: An organized criminal syndicate successfully infiltrates a major pharmaceutical supply chain, distributing counterfeit hypertension medication across multiple regions. The fake pills are laced with toxic substances to mimic the real drug's color and shape, undetectable without advanced chemical analysis. As millions of patients unknowingly ingest these counterfeits, hospitals face an unprecedented influx of cases exhibiting severe poisoning symptoms and uncontrolled blood pressure spikes, overwhelming emergency services.
